meanings.definition: Metal spikes attached to the sole of a boot for climbing on ice or rock.
meanings.sent1: She carefully strapped on her crampons before attempting to climb the icy slope.
meanings.sent2: The mountaineer relied on crampons to grip the slippery surface.
meanings.sent3: The crampons made her boots look like they had grown sharp teeth.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as the grip of crampons on sheer ice.
meanings.sent5: The sound of crampons biting into the frozen ground echoed in the silent valley.
